snippet: Bill Cosby plans to return to television this fall with a stand-up comedy concert titled “Far From Finished,” his first special in 30 years.
abstract: Bill Cosby plans to return to television in November with his first stand-up special in 30 years; show, titled Far From Finished, will appear on Comedy Central.
lead_paragraph: Bill Cosby plans to return to television this fall with a stand-up comedy concert titled “Far From Finished,” his first special in 30 years.

headline.print_headline: Comedy Central Plans A Cosby TV Special
headline.main: Comedy Central Plans a Cosby TV Special
